content: in this civil case the court ruled that the hereditary community between the plaintiff and the defendants was dissolved the court ordered the division of assets based on a specific solution proposed by an expert one of the defendants was also ordered to reimburse the plaintiffs sister for her share of the assets the court rejected the plaintiffs request to revise the value of certain properties and dismissed their claim regarding the enjoyment of an apartment by one of the defendants the court determined the amount to be collated based on the difference between the purchase price and market value of the properties the court also addressed the claims made by a bank that had intervened in the case ruling that their mortgage on the plaintiffs share of the properties would remain in effect the court granted the banks request for the transfer of the mortgage and the assignment of certain sums of money the court ordered the divisional costs to be shared between the parties the court of pordenone made a final ruling on the case declaring the dissolution of the hereditary community and ordering the division of assets the court also determined that the costs of the division should be shared proportionally between the parties the court partially accepted the claims brought by a third party intervener bank nl spa and declared that the judicial mortgages registered on the plaintiffs property would take effect the court declared that the costs of the proceedings were fully compensated by the plaintiff and the third party intervener this decision was made on august 10 2010
